title: Add folders to F12 Dev Tool Script Sources
body: When you're working with multiple scripts, especially with source maps (eg from TypeScript) Google Chrome dev tools shows a folder structure in the left hand side of the sources tab. IE F12 developer tools just shows a list of all the .js files.....

comments.body:
It should be possible to deactivate the feature:
To avoid caching problems with some proxies a common workaround is the usage of a unique version-stamp as "folder" and use an URL-Rewrite on server-site to remove this information.
This is a must-have for SPA debugging in Edge.
Just evaluating Edge and without this feature it's not possible to debug in Edge.
